data.quote: It is a useless life that is not consecrated to a great ideal. It is like a stone wasted on the field without becoming a part of any edifice.
data.author: Jose Rizal

data.quote: One person of integrity can make a difference.
data.author: Elie Wiesel

data.quote: Think higher. Feel deeper.
data.author: Elie Wiesel

data.quote: There are victories of the soul and spirit. Sometimes, even if you lose, you win.
data.author: Elie Wiesel

data.quote: Ultimately, the only power to which man should aspire is that which he exercises over himself.
data.author: Elie Wiesel

data.quote: Everyone dies.  It is how one lives that matters.
data.author: R.A. Salvatore

data.quote: There is no way of truly knowing where a road will lead until it is walked.
data.author: R.A. Salvatore

data.quote: Adaptability is the simple secret of survival.
data.author: Jessica Hagedorn

data.quote: Life begins at the end of your comfort zone.
data.author: Neale Donald Walsch

data.quote: Even a life of pain is not worth wasting.
data.author: Dan Abnett

data.quote: The strong look for more strength, the weak for excuses.
data.author: Margaret George

data.quote: What is one person's diversion may be another's supreme test.
data.author: Margaret George

data.quote: Fortune offers you opportunities to create; she does not hand you presents.
data.author: Margaret George

data.quote: It is better, I think, to grab at the stars than to sit flustered because you know you cannot reach them.
data.author: R.A. Salvatore

data.quote: Follow your heart, minute by minute and day by day. Let the course of the river run as it will, instead of tying yourself up in fears that you may never realize.
data.author: R.A. Salvatore

data.quote: Only when we admit to our failures and recognize our weaknesses can we rise above them.
data.author: R.A. Salvatore

data.quote: Only with the honest knowledge that one day I will die can I ever truly begin to live.
data.author: R.A. Salvatore

data.quote: For whatever we do in our lives, discipline and control over our own actions ultimately measure the level of our success.
data.author: R.A. Salvatore

data.quote: Perhaps man wasnâ€™t meant for paradise. Maybe he was meant to claw, to scratch all the way.
data.author: Captain James T. Kirk, Star Trek

data.quote: Live now; make now always the most precious time. Now will never come again.
data.author: Captain Jean-Luc Picard, Star Trek
